title: Twitter Mobs, Miscommunications, and Biological Sex
description:
Last week evolutionary biologist Colin Wright was kind enough to speak with me on the debate surrounding biological sex. This is a topic that Colin has revisited often on twitter, and I wanted to catch up with him on the current state of the debate

Follow Colin on twitter here: @SwipeWright
Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
email here: andreawiththebangs@gmail.com
